message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this generous offer and we'll both leave with something.
Alice, my turn.  Let's be fair - I'm offering a 60/40 split.  It's better than what you'll get in future rounds!
Don't be greedy, Bob. This is your last chance for a decent share before inflation eats away at the value even more.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous! I'm offering you almost half.  Take the deal before inflation makes it even less appealing for both of us!
